item.title: Saving Ordinances Will Bring Us Marvelous Light
item.description:
Saving Ordinances Will Bring Us Marvelous Light by Elder Taniela B. Wakolo, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 188th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2018
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Taniela B. Wakolo, Of the Seventy

item.title: God Loves His Children
item.description:
God Loves His Children by Elder Taniela B. Wakolo, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Morning of 191st Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 2021
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
